pullrequest.title: GetName() is deprecated, changed to Name()

content.raw:
This change has already been made on the gazebo8 branch:

* https://bitbucket.org/MichaelSzer/gazebo/src/0a80f10918576cf1fc4787ebb6f1b9cb424a0c8b/examples/plugins/factory/factory.cc?at=gazebo8&fileviewer=file-view-default#factory.cc-65

I suspect the problem is that the tutorials haven't been updated yet for gazebo8.
